title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS FORD RANGER & MAZDA BT50 – FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS FORD RANGER & MAZDA BT50 – FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT

Western Filters Ford Ranger & Mazda BT50 Fuel Manager Pre-filter Water Separator Kit available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Fuel Manager Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit suits:

  • Mazda BT50
  • Ford Ranger PX2 P5AT 3.2L & PX P4AT 2.2L
  • Turbo Diesels from 2011-2017

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. This kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it!

Kit Includes:

  • 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager – Made by Stanadyne in the USA (Filters down to 30 Microns!)
  • Mounting Bolts, washers & Nyloc nuts
  • 1 Mtr of 10mm Quality Fuel hose
  • Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket
  • 3/8 Inch Straight Barb fittings
  • Blanking Plugs
  • Hose Clamps
  • Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)
  • 3x 9.89mm & 1x 9.49mm
  • “Black Quick Fittings”

Check out the full range of products available for your Ford Ranger or Mazda BT50!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
